details.creator: veraPDF Consortium
details.name: ISO 14289-2:202x - 8.10 Forms - 8.10.2.3 Contents entry - AA and Contents
details.description: If an additional action (AA) entry is present in a widget annotation dictionary, the respective widget's Contents entry shall be present

rule.description: If an additional action (AA) entry is present in a widget annotation dictionary, the respective widget's Contents entry shall be present

error.message: Widget annotation dictionary contains an AA entry, but does not contain the Contents entry
